description: Jint engine implementation depends on the service design.
Malicious unit tests validate the exception handling and security constraints.
mitigation_plan: QA to pair with backend dev to understand implementation details.
impact_if_delayed: Delays security validation for the sandbox.

description: Monaco Editor wrapper component depends on the successful PoC.
mitigation_plan: PoC is the mitigation; if it fails, pivot to a simpler editor.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire interactive UI feature set.

description: Frontend 'Create Script' page depends on the backend API being available.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mock API until the real endpoint is deployed to dev environment.
impact_if_delayed: Delays UI completion for script creation.
